text.emotional: [confusion, high]David, huh?[/confusion] Well… actually. [happiness, medium]Why not? I can’t wait to see how he goofs up the fishing line or straight up falls in the river. That’ll be fun! [/happiness]
text.silence: {.} david huh {....} well {....} actually why not {....} i can't wait to see how he goofs up the fishing line or straight up falls in the river {....} that'll be fun {...}
